return_instructions: Contact Mallinckrodt Returns Department at 1-800-778-7898 for return authorization. All controlled substances must be pre-approved.
Return through McKesson Pharmaceutical Returns Service or contact Pfizer Customer Service at 1-800-879-3477 for authorization.
Use J&J Returns Portal online or contact customer service at 1-800-526-7736. Returns must be authorized within 90 days of expiration.
Returns must be pre-authorized. Call 1-800-525-8747 or email returns@sandoz.com for authorization.
